currency.accessKeyDescription: API key provided for free by https://exchangerate.host
currency.currencySymbolDescription: Used for display purposes only; changing this will affect all currency units in the system
currency.currencyUnitDescription: Used for display purposes only; changing this will affect all currency units in the system

invite.commissionFirstTimeOnlyDescription: When enabled, commission is generated only on the inviter's first payment; you can configure individual users in user management
invite.enableForcedInviteDescription: When enabled, only invited users can register
invite.inviteCommissionPercentageDescription: Default global commission distribution ratio; you can configure individual ratios in user management

site.logoDescription: Used for displaying the logo in designated locations
site.logoPlaceholder: Enter the URL of the logo, without ending with '/'
site.siteDescDescription: Used for displaying the site description in designated locations
site.siteDomainDescription: Domain address of the current website, e.g., used in emails
site.siteDomainPlaceholder: Please enter the domain address. For multiple domains, please enter one per line.
site.siteNameDescription: Used for displaying the site name in designated locations

telegram.botTokenDescription: Enter the token provided by Botfather
telegram.enableBotNotificationsDescription: When enabled, the bot will send basic notifications to linked Telegram admins and users
telegram.groupURLDescription: If filled, will be displayed to users or used in required locations
telegram.webhookDomainDescription: Enter the domain name of the webhook server

verify.turnstileSecretDescription: Turnstile secret key provided by Cloudflare
verify.turnstileSiteKeyDescription: Turnstile site key provided by Cloudflare
